name: W**d Farm
content: Yeah I'mma need the whole thing
是的 我想要知道全部的真相
Not half I want the whole thing
不是管中窥豹 而是了解全部的真相
We gon' take that
我们将要采取措施
Put a few O's in there

都把我奉为偶像 遵守我的指示
I remember I was getting curved

I be pulling up with niggas one rolled
我会和兄弟们一起享受**
Just say my name if you wanna smoke
